name: Constrictor Snake
description: A large, muscular serpent known for its ability to coil around prey and squeeze tightly.
memorable: Its immense strength allows it to deal significant damage, even to larger creatures.
goals: Hunts prey by lying in wait before ambushing.
relations: Can be encountered alongside other jungle or swamp predators.
environment: Typically found in jungles, forests, and swamps.
strengths: Skilled at stealth and camouflage, making it a dangerous ambusher.
weaknesses: Lacks venom, which limits its lethality.
attacks: Bite deals piercing damage, while Constrict grapples and restrains targets.
most_powerful_ability: Constrict allows it to immobilize its prey while inflicting damage.
senses: Has blindsight out to 10 feet, allowing it to sense nearby vibrations and movement.
additional_information: Can consume prey whole after capturing it.
Uses its strength to deal damage rather than relying on agility.
Grappling an opponent restricts their movement.
Can ambush effectively due to its camouflage.
Relatively low defenses with only an Armor Class of 12.
test_queries: large ambush snake with powerful constriction
muscular serpent that hunts in jungles
snake that grapples and restrains prey
powerful serpent that swallows prey whole
